summary: Rich socialite Chantal marries Eugene, a photographer, and everything seems blissful until her envious friend attempts to break them up. In desperation, she turns to her mother, but the advice she receives may do more harm than good.
cast: Sandra Dee|Bobby Darin|Micheline Presle|John Lund|Cesar Romero|Stefanie Powers|Christopher Knight|Ted Thorpe|Roger Bacon|John Bleifer|Pamela Searle|Warrene Ott|Dani Lynn|Charlene Holt|Gloria Camacho|Edmay Van Dyke|Rosalee Calvert|Jeffrey Sayre|Gladys Thornton
title: Una esposa para dos
